question: I have had a bladder infection for about 2 weeks now. Cipro bid x 7 days, repeat U/A 4 days after. I repeated the U/A today, and am now spilling ketones also, as well as leukocytes present. A culture was sent in. The Cipro noted only 30-60% effectiveness after they did a culture/sensitivity the first U/A. I'm concerned. I have Alpha One deficiency ZZ pheno type, and CREST syndrome. I weigh 123 lbs, and 5' 6 1/2 ". Diabetes??
title: UTI
